# Correlate Facebook metrics data

```{r}
matCorr <-
  df %>% 
  select(impressions,
         reach,
         clicksAll,
         linkClicks,
         uniqueClicksAll,
         uniqueLinkClicks,
         reactions,
         comments,
         shares) %>% 
  as.matrix %>% 
  cor(use = "pairwise.complete.obs")
matCorr[lower.tri(matCorr)] <- NA
matCorr %>% 
  kable(digits = 2)
```
